questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A. Who is the cartoonist siding with-the extremists or Charlie hebdo? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources B and C. How far do you think the Muslim in Source C would have agreed with the American cartoonist in Source B? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source D. Why is this article published? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source E. Are you surprised by this source? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source F. How useful is this source as evidence about the attitudes of the French community towards the Muslim in France? Explain your answer.
